answers.answer: Yes my feet are huge I have cankles lol
Yes my feet are huge I have cankles lol
I have cankles too and my whole legs swelled up last night too. Uggh 3 more weeks of this, 3more weeks!
Yes my feet n ankles swell up n go down all day long
Lol...I had swelling in my right hand two days ago I just message it now yeserday I had it n my knuckles on my right hand...this doesn't have anything to do with preeclampsia?
Yes and it hurts. Like. Shir

I only swell up if I work too hard or eat too much salt. It is usually in my feet and ankles, but it can also be in my hands and wrists, especially my right one since I'm right hand dominant. I'm 35+5. A little swelling is normal in pregnancy. If the swelling gets bad or goes to your face, your doctor may want to monitor your blood pressure.

Yesterday my feet were giantnormous, but i went shopping and was walking for hours. So thats usually the cause of mine. But yes my lovely little ankes dissapeared a while ago lol 2 in a half weeks to go!! Or if i eat salty stuff i swell up everywhere face, arms, legs, feet and hands...i hate when my hands swell up...can't grab anything without staring at little sausages:( but thats rare, i try so hard not to eat salty stuff!!
My feet and I recently bought 2 new pairs of cute sandals and one I can't even zip up in the back the other leaves marks on my feet when I take them off so they are retired already:(
